text.p: -- SoundView Financial Group Inc said analyst Michael Karfopoulos upgraded Ascend Communications Inc to long-term buy from hold.
-- said kept the short-term rating as buy.
-- said raised the fiscal 1997 earnings estimate to $1.69 a share from $1.55 a share and the fiscal 1998 estimate to $2.10 a share from $2.07 a share.
-- said the long-term price target is $63 a share.
